channel.title: Editing Cache Packed Sprite text?
channel.description: So this is really bugging me. I've got a sprite, and it is cache packed. I want to edit the text on the sprite, and change it to a custom one. I mean, repacking the sprite won't be hard, but I don't know it's name. It's the accepted aid in this picture: [img]http://puu.sh/343ie.jpg[/img] Notice in the top corner it says 12464. The clicking button via server is 48176. How would I edit this in RSInterface?

item.title: Editing Cache Packed Sprite text?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:6, topic:520345”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=638843.msg4306264#msg4306264 date=1369875150]

The text in upper left hand corner has to deal with the ‘drawTooltip’ method in your client class. Also, this might help you, but try searching for ‘class9_1.tooltip’.

So could I just make a method like “public void editAccept(TextDrawingArea[] TDA)” or some name and have this in it?:
drawTooltip(itheID, MyNewText);

Or would that just not work?
[/quote]
It might it you override the current button. Just include the current interface in the interface you’re going to make.[/quote]
Well that’s just it. I’m not making an entire interface. I want to edit one sprite, and 1/2 lines of text.

Read full topic

item.title: Editing Cache Packed Sprite text?
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:5, topic:520345”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=638843.msg4306251#msg4306251 date=1369873232]
The text in upper left hand corner has to deal with the ‘drawTooltip’ method in your client class. Also, this might help you, but try searching for ‘class9_1.tooltip’.
[/quote]
So could I just make a method like “public void editAccept(TextDrawingArea[] TDA)” or some name and have this in it?:
drawTooltip(itheID, MyNewText);

Or would that just not work?[/quote]
It might it you override the current button. Just include the current interface in the interface you’re going to make.

Read full topic

3lv3n snip3r:

The text in upper left hand corner has to deal with the ‘drawTooltip’ method in your client class. Also, this might help you, but try searching for ‘class9_1.tooltip’.

So could I just make a method like “public void editAccept(TextDrawingArea[] TDA)” or some name and have this in it?:
drawTooltip(itheID, MyNewText);

item.title: Editing Cache Packed Sprite text?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

I don’t think the tooltip is part of the sprite. You might have the find out what the tooltip line id is.

Well I know, but I want to edit both the tooltip and the text in the top right.
It’s just another one of the problems I’m having.
I need to edit the sprite, and the text.

Read full topic
